TestInformation.Title: HPC Challenge
TestInformation.Description: HPC Challenge (HPCC) is a cluster-focused benchmark consisting of the HPL Linpack TPP benchmark, DGEMM, STREAM, PTRANS, RandomAccess, FFT, and communication bandwidth and latency. This HPC Challenge test profile attempts to ship with standard yet versatile configuration/input files though they can be modified.
TestInformation.PreInstallMessage: Supported install-time optional variables include $MPI_PATH, $MPI_INCLUDE, $MPI_CC, $MPI_LIBS, $LA_PATH, $LA_INCLUDE, $LA_LIBS, $CFLAGS, $LD_FLAGS, and $MPI_LD
TestInformation.PostInstallMessage: Supported run-time optional environment variables include $N, $NB, $MPI_NUM_THREADS, $HOSTFILE

TestProfile.ExternalDependencies: build-utilities, fortran-compiler, openmpi-development, blas-development, atlas-development, lapack-development
